items.title: Embedded Engineering
items.text: We develop electronic systems for you that are embedded in other devices, such as cars, airplanes, household appliances and cell phones.

items.title: Battery Management
items.text: We develop software for you that monitors and controls batteries to increase their service life, performance and safety.

items.title: Machine Learning
items.text: We develop machine learning software that optimizes decision-making processes to enhance efficiency.
